titles.title: Expressing support for the recognition of the week of November 3 through November 9, 2024, as "Drowsy Driving Prevention Week".
Expressing support for the recognition of the week of November 3 through November 9, 2024, as "Drowsy Driving Prevention Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: This resolution (1) supports the designation of Drowsy Driving Prevention Week to raise awareness about the dangers of drowsy driving, and (2) encourages people across the United States to take preventable steps against drowsy driving.
